The Prime Minister began publishing works.
Thanks to the people who encouraged me to work for the government.
I want to see that. What is the condition before we come? Today is What will we do next?
If you do not go back to 2009, you will not understand how the government works under conditions.
The government considers that the first thing to do is to alleviate the suffering of the people. And maintain the purchasing power of the economy.
At first the government was very critical. Why not bring the budget to stimulate exports. Or make a mega project
The government seems to have to accelerate the income of people in the country did not fall before. Reduce public expenditure.
This is the source of strong Thai action.
Examples of projects are the Seedling Project. To solve the unemployment problem Overpay
There are more people in this program than 8,000 people trained over 4 hundred thousand people.
The seedlings project exceeded the target. The money is less than the set budget of 5000 million.
The unemployment rate is around 7-8,000 at the beginning of the year, but at the end of the year, it is about four hundred thousand people (1.2%).
When we can maintain the world economy well. When the world economy improves Everything will get together.
The Ministry of Tourism is confident that this year there are 14 million tourists over the target.

The welfare policy covers all people. From young children To the elderly
The health center is being elevated as a district health promotion hospital.
The most important The most affected policy is farmers' income insurance.
We create a guarantee for farmers. Agriculture and not loss.
1 year ago, we stepped out of the populace to social welfare.
In addition to economic problems. We also solve social and political problems.
The drug problem was solved. Both the arrest and the number of cases.
I will not say that. Today, politics is stagnant. But we move to a political system.
Legislation has done more than in the past.
I give time to the council. Reply to this topic Start new topic Time for the opposition
Government measures I need legal help.
Reconciliation problem We try to bring politics back to normal.
No one can do it alone. I strictly adhere to the principle of justice.
April Events The government has used the law to control the situation.
The government has stepped back. To the country ahead.
I do not disagree with the dissolution of the council. Just economic forward And all parties accept the rules.
All non-compliant behaviors must stop.
I am not happy about the violence in the south. But it is a full walk ahead.
We are moving towards the Special Economic Zone of the South. Have a clear goal.
I'm not satisfied with corrupt corruption. To be more strict.
We stop the problematic community project. Change Management To be transparently verified.

last year I promised 6 brothers and sisters.

The Village Fund And extend the repayment period.
Throughout the year, the government has organized activities for the people to reconcile. And devotion

Everything I say on the day. I have done everything.
We do 15 years of free money. The community sufficiency to reduce the cost of living in 99 days.
I reported the facts. Of course, there are both satisfied and dissatisfied people.
I think the government must check. Criticism
The number I am most satisfied with. The happiness index of Thai people is higher than 2-3 years ago.
I want to talk about the future. What is the next step?
Thailand will continue to move forward. Add money to the pockets of the public. Increase private investment.
To solve the Map Ta Phut problem as soon as possible. Land reform tax system to make 3G systems important.
Risk factors include global oil prices, fragile economies. Politics in the country
One year ago The country is ahead of public prosperity.
I do not go far as everyone hopes. But I will continue to work.
If the violence. All things done in the past year will be gone.

And to help create happiness in the country in 2010 thanks.
